nodes.bodyText: What does this check do? The DESUGARED_MAPPING_CONSTR_KEY constant doesn't seem to be set as a var name anywhere?

This is the name we use when desugaring the record literal to a struct or map literal - 
  
    
      ballerina-lang/compiler/ballerina-lang/src/main/java/org/wso2/ballerinalang/compiler/desugar/Desugar.java
    
    
         Line 6172
      in
      133d901
    
    
    
    

        
          
           String name = DESUGARED_MAPPING_CONSTR_KEY + this.annonVarCount++;
